data.name: Winter Soldier
data.description: An elite Hydra agent who assaults his chosen target with deadly attacks that prevent healing.

starItems.name: Winter Soldier
starItems.description: An elite Hydra agent who assaults his chosen target with deadly attacks that prevent healing.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage and <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Bonus attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Always Bonus attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
Bonus attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on Bonus Attacks

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on Bonus Attacks

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on Bonus Attacks
Bonus attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Bonus attack <color=#86e619>3</color> times

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus attack <color=#86e619>3</color> times for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage on all attacks
Always apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on Bonus Attacks

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus attack <color=#86e619>3</color> times for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to the primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>110%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>440%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on the primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>440%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>110%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>550%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>630%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

1.description:
When a Captain America ally is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance.
If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies
<color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health if Baron Zemo or Captain America is an ally

2.description:
When a Captain America ally is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance.
If Baron Zemo or Captain America is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies

3.description:
When a Captain America ally is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance.
If Baron Zemo or Captain America is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health if Baron Zemo or Captain America is an ally

4.description:
When a Captain America ally is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance.
If Baron Zemo or Captain America is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit chance for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit chance for all <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies

5.description:
When a Captain America ally is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit chance. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit chance.
If Baron Zemo or Captain America is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
